name: Pesky
description:
PESKY

Your only goal is to wreak havoc on the town. Be careful, the more chaos you cause the more likely you are to be caught  by animal control! Knock garbage cans over, attack citizens and even destroy the insides of their homes. Lose all three lives and it's game over!

Play as Walter the goose, Tammy the skunk, and Carlos the raccoon in this wacky game!

FISH PEOPLE STUDIOS

Allan Seckora

Susan Evans

Alex Hill 

Dan Hying

Leslie Murphy

Thomas Rosik

Tristan Lohengrin

Seth Berrier
